promise.ghg_emissions_directly_associated: Commitment to reduce Scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions by 50% by 2030 from 2019 baseline; net-zero in operations by 2050; 66% reduction achieved in 2024.
promise.ghg_emission_scope_1: Part of target to reduce Scope 1 and 2 GHG emissions by 50% by 2030 from 2019 baseline; net-zero in operations by 2050.
promise.energy_consumption: Target to source 60% of power to operations from renewable sources by 2030 (RE100).
promise.water_usage: Leading water stewardship: implement holistic water strategies at sites in high-risk watersheds and high-consumption sites; enable millions of people access to clean water through leadership in water technology and partnerships.

energy_consumption.description: Target Forward outlines interim and final renewable electricity goals: 60% by 2025 and 100% by 2030 for operations.
Climate and Energy page confirmsTarget's targets: 60% renewable electricity by 2025 and 100% by 2030 for operations.
Target press release references progress toward renewable-energy goals and the 2030 target for 100% electricity from renewables.

water_usage.description: Ohio Attorney General announces a proposed $110 million settlement with DuPont over PFAS contamination along the Ohio River linked to the Washington Works facility.
DuPont press release detailing the $110 million Ohio settlement for PFAS-related environmental restoration at the Washington Works site.
U.S. EPA page describing SDWA settlements with Chemours and DuPont related to PFAS discharges from Washington Works, indicating regulatory action and ongoing remediation.
AP News report: Federal court orders Chemours to immediately stop unlawfully polluting the Ohio River with PFAS, highlighting regulatory noncompliance and ongoing environmental harm.
Reuters coverage of a 2025 settlement with New Jersey for PFAS claims totaling about $875 million, with DuPont, Chemours, and Corteva as defendants.
Guardian report on PFAS pollution lawsuit against Chemours' Washington Works plant, illustrating ongoing legal challenges related to water contamination.
